extension_description.message: Translet di tɛks we yu dɔn pik na di wɛb pej ɛn kɔnvɔyt to fɔmat we yu dɔn tɔk bɔt.

turn_off_description.message: Translet bɔtin go pop-ap ɛvri tɛm we dɛn pik di tɛks

turn_on_description.message: Translet bɔtin nɔ go sho we yu pik di tɛks bɔt yu kin stil translet bay we yu klik di Pro Translet aykɔn na di tulba

settings.message: Sɛtin dɛn we dɛn dɔn mek

target_language.message: Langwej we dɛn de tɔk bɔt

target_language_description.message: Pik di difɔlt langwej we yu want fɔ tɔk to

auto_switch.message: Swich ɔtomɛtik wan to di sɛkɔn langwej we yu want fɔ tɔk to

auto_switch_description.message: We di tɛks we yu dɔn pik na di difɔlt langwej we yu want fɔ yuz, translet am to sɛkɔn langwej we yu want fɔ tɔk to

second_target_language_description.message: Pik di difɔlt sɛkɔn langwej we yu want fɔ tɔk to

target_format_description.message: Selekt di difɔlt target fɔmat, fɔmat kin chenj na transleshɔn panɛl

auto_set_format_description.message: We yu chenj fɔmat na transleshɔn panɛl, sɛt di fɔmat we yu dɔn pik to difɔlt fɔmat

format_and_order_description.message: Fɔmat kes dɛn we dɛn kin chenj na transleshɔn panɛl ɛn displei ɔda

translate_button_on_description.message: Translet bɔtin go pop-ap ɛvri tɛm we dɛn pik di tɛks

translate_button_off_description.message: Translet bɔtin nɔ go sho we yu pik di tɛks bɔt yu kin stil translet bay we yu klik di Pro Translet aykɔn na di tulba
